headline: 1 Consumer Stock with Competitive Advantages and 2 We Ignore
summary: Regarded as defensive investments, consumer staples stocks are generally safe bets in choppy markets. On the other hand, they usually underperform during bull runs, and this paradigm has rung true over the past six months as the sector’s -7.5% decline paled in comparison to the S&P 500’s 20% gain.
